K12grahmdhu:4: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān aḍakavatyāṃ mahānagaryām anekadevanāgayakṣarākṣasagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāpasmārādityasomāṅgārabudhabṛhaspatiśukraśaniścararāhuketvādibhiś
K12grahmdhu:8: tadyathā - vajrapāṇinā ca nāma bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
K12grahmdhu:29: evaṃ pramukhair bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto bhagavān dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
K12grahmdhu:30: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ (Gmdh 172)
K12grahmdhu:31: suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaparyavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma /
K12grahmdhu:33: atha khalu vajrapāṇir bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tat parṣanmaṇḍalam avalokyāsanād utthāya
K12grahmdhu:34: svaṛddhyādhiṣṭhānena bhagavantam anekaśatasahasraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya praṇamya purato
K12grahmdhu:35: niṣadya sagarveṇa paryaṅkam ābhujya līlayā tat parṣanmaṇḍalam avalokya vajrāñjalī
K12grahmdhu:37: grahāś ca bhagavann ugrānugrarūpāś ca raudrāraudrarūpās ca krūrākrūrarūpāś ca sattvān viheṭhayanti /
K12grahmdhu:38: keṣāñcit prāṇam apaharanti keṣāñcid upadravāś ca kurvanti keṣāñcid ojohārāṃś ca kurvanti keṣāñcid dravyam apaharanti keṣāñcid dīrghāyuṣsattvānām alpāyuṣaṃ kurvanti /
K12grahmdhu:40: tad deśayatu bhagavan dharmaparyāyaṃ yena sarvasattvānāṃ sarvopadravebhyo rakṣā bhaviṣyati /
K12grahmdhu:41: bhagavān āha - sādhu sādhu vajrapāṇe yas tvaṃ sarvasattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya kṛpācittam utpādya mahāguhyātiguhyataraṃ tathāgataṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paripṛcchasi /
K12grahmdhu:42: tac chṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te /
K12grahmdhu:43: grahāṇām ugrarūpāṇāṃ krūrātibhīṣaṇamukhānāṃ mahāguhyātiguhyataraṃ divyapūjām arghaṃ ca jāpañ ca dhūpañ ca -
K12grahmdhu:46: devāś cāpy asurāś caiva kinnarāś ca mahoragāḥ /
K12grahmdhu:47: yakṣāś ca rākṣasāś caiva manuṣāś caivāmānuṣāḥ // 2 //
K12grahmdhu:48: śamayanti ca kruddhāś ca mahānugrāś ca tejasā /
K12grahmdhu:49: pūjāṃ teṣāṃ pravakṣāmi mantrāṃś cāpi yathākramam* // 3 //
K12grahmdhu:50: atha khalu bhagavāñ chākyamuniḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svahṛdayāt karuṇāvikrīḍitaṃ nāma raśmijvālaṃ niścārya grahāṇāṃ mūrdhni praveśayati sma /
K12grahmdhu:51: atha tatkṣaṇād eva te sarve ādityādayo grahā utthāya bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam
K12grahmdhu:52: arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ sarvābhir divyapūjābhiḥ pūjayitvā praṇamya jānubhir nipatya
K12grahmdhu:55: anugṛhītā vayaṃ bhagavatā tathāgatenārhato samyaksaṃbuddhena tad deśayatu bhagavan tādṛśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ yena vayaṃ sāmagrībhūtasya dharmabhāṇakasya rakṣāṃ kuryāmaḥ /
K12grahmdhu:56: guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhanaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kuryāmaḥ /
K12grahmdhu:57: atha khalu bhagavāñ chākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho grahāṇāṃ mantrapūjāñ ca bhāṣate sma /
K12grahmdhu:67: yathānukramabhedena diśāś copadiśāś ca gandhamaṇḍalakaṃ padmamadhye dvādaśāṅgulapramāṇaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ catustoraṇaśobhitaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ cakrasamanvitaṃ kartavyam* /
K12grahmdhu:68: tanmadhye sitakamalopari kuṅkumagandhamaṇḍalake cintayed devaṃ bhāskaraṃ tāpasarūpadharaṃ bhujābhyāṃ sitakamaladharaṃ raktavarṇaṃ sahasrasūryakoṭisamatejomālinaṃ vigraham* /
K12grahmdhu:71: pūrvasyāṃ diśi raktakamalopari priyaṅgugandhamaṇḍalake somo brāhmaṇa iti jñeyaṃ sitavarṇaṃ jaṭāmukuṭapuṣpāvasaktaṃ bhojanaghṛtodanaṃ śrīvāsadhūpaḥ
K12grahmdhu:74: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śuklakamalopari candanagandhamaṇḍalake bhikṣurūpo maṅgalo raktavarṇo
K12grahmdhu:75: ratnamakuṭo vāme śakti dakṣiṇe varadahasto bhojanam asya kṣīrabhojanaṃ bhāṣabhaktaṃ vā gugguladhūpaḥ /
K12grahmdhu:78: paścimāyām diśi raktapadmopari kṛṣṇāgarugandhamaṇḍalake brahmacārī budhaḥ syāt pītavarṇo raktaśmaśruḥ akṣasūtrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ /
K12grahmdhu:83: uttarasyāṃ diśi sitakamalopari devadārugandhamaṇḍalake parivrājako gurus taptakāñcanavarṇābho raktaśmaśruḥ akṣasūtrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ /
K12grahmdhu:87: āgneyāṃ diśi raktapadmopari candanagandhamaṇḍalake śukrapāśupatadhāri gokṣīravarṇadhavalāmbho jaṭāmukutākṣasūtrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ /
K12grahmdhu:89: oṃ namaḥ śukrādhipataye asurottamāya śuddhavigrahe svāhā /
K12grahmdhu:90: nairṛtyāṃ diśi sitapaṅkajopari nīlacandanagandhamaṇḍalake śaniścaro kṛṣṇavarṇaphaṇabhṛtkṣapaṇako jñeyaḥ bījajaṭāmukuṭaśmaśruḥ /
K12grahmdhu:95: vāyavyāṃ diśi raktāmbhojopari tagarādigandhamaṇḍalake kāpāliko rāhu rājāvartanibho
K12grahmdhu:98: asya deyaṃ bhāṣāmiṣabhojanaṃ tilakṛṣaro vā vilvapatradhūpaḥ /
K12grahmdhu:101: aiśānyāṃ diśi raktasaroruhopari spṛkkāgandhamaṇḍalake cāṇḍālaketur bhavet* /
K12grahmdhu:103: asya deyaṃ bhojanaṃ dhṛtapūrakaṃ sajjaraso dhūpaḥ /
K12grahmdhu:105: maṇḍalasya pūrvadvāre buddho bhagavān dakṣiṇadvāre vajrapāṇiḥ paścimadvāre lokanāthaḥ uttaradvāre mañjuśrīkumāraḥ /
K12grahmdhu:106: pūrvottarakoṇe sarve grahāḥ pūrvadakṣiṇakoṇe sarve rāśinakṣatrāḥ dakṣiṇapaścimakoṇe sarvopadravāḥ paścimottarakoṇe bhaṭṭārikā mahāvidyā /
K12grahmdhu:107: śvetā nīlāruṇatrimukhā hastadvayena vyākhyānamudrā dakṣiṇe ratnachatrā vāme pāśaśaktidharā ratnamukuṭīvajraparyaṅkopaviṣṭā candāsanasamāsīnā ṣoḍaśavarṣākārā sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitā /
K12grahmdhu:108: bāhyapūrvadvāre dhṛtarāṣṭrasya dadhibhaktaṃ dakṣiṇe virūḍhakasya dadhimāṣabhaktaṃ paścime virūpākṣasya kṣīrabhatam uttare kuberasya dadhimāṣabhaktaṃ sindūramastakam* /
K12grahmdhu:111: dhṛtamadhubhyāṃ śaṃkhaṃ pūrayitvā pañcaratnaṃ prakṣipyārgho deyaḥ /
K12grahmdhu:115: oṃ namaḥ sarvatathāgatebhyaḥ sarvāśāparipūrakebhyaḥ sarvathā bhaktine svāhā /
K12grahmdhu:116: ratnatrayasya mantraṃ evaṃ pratyekaṃ japet saptasaptāṣṭaśataṃ mantram ekaikaśaḥ /
K12grahmdhu:117: evaṃ pūjitāḥ sarve grahā vividharūpiṇo dadati vipulān bhogān saubhāgyān* janayanty api /
K12grahmdhu:118: imāni vajrapāṇe navagrahāṇāṃ hṛdayāni paṭhitasiddhāni tathānukramabhedena gandhamaṇḍalakaṃ
K12grahmdhu:119: kṛtvā dvādaśāṅgulimadhye pūjayitavyāni tāmramṛṇmayarūpyādibhojanena arghaṃ datvāṣṭottaraśatavārān
K12grahmdhu:121: paścāt punar vajrapāṇe gṛhamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni saptavārānuccārayitavyāni /
K12grahmdhu:123: dāridryaṃ duḥkhaṃ mocayiṣyanti gatāyuṣaṃ dīrghāyuṣaṃ kariṣyanti /
K12grahmdhu:124: yaś ca khalu punar vajrapāṇe bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikān ye vā sattvajātīyā yeṣāṃ karṇapuṭe śabdaṃ nipatiṣyanti na teṣām akālamṛtyunā kālaṃ kariṣyanti /
K12grahmdhu:125: yaś ca khalu punar vajrapāṇe grahān maṇḍalamadhye pūjayitvā dine dine saptavārānuccārayiṣyanti / tatra
K12grahmdhu:126: tasya dharmabhāṇakasya sarve grahāḥ sarveṇa sarvāśāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti /
K12grahmdhu:128: atha khalu bhagavāñ chākyamuni tathāgataḥ punar api gṛhamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni bhāṣate sma /
K12grahmdhu:140: oṃ buddhe 2 śuddhe 2 vajre 2 padme 2 sara 2 prasare 2 smara 2 krīḍa 2 krīḍaya 2 mara
K12grahmdhu:141: 2 māraya 2 mardaya 2 stambha 2 stambhaya 2 ghaṭa 2 ghāṭaya 2 mama sarvasattvānāñ
K12grahmdhu:142: ca vighnān* chinda chinda bhinda 2 sarvavighnān nāśanaṃ kuru 2 mama saparivārasya
K12grahmdhu:143: sarvasattvānāñ ca kāryaṃ kṣepaya 2 mama sarvasattvānāñ ca sarvanakṣatragrahapīḍān
K12grahmdhu:144: nivāraya 2 bhagavati śriyaṃ kuru mahāmāyā prasādhaya sarvaduṣṭān nāśaya sarvapāpāni
K12grahmdhu:145: mama saparivārasya sarvasattvānāñ ca rakṣa 2 vajre 2 caṇḍe 2 caṇḍini 2 nuru 2 musu
K12grahmdhu:146: 2 mumu 2 muñca 2 havā have ugre ugratare pūraya bhagavati manorathaṃ mama sarvaparivārasya
K12grahmdhu:171: imāni vajrapāṇe grahamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni sarvasiddhikarāṇi ca /
K12grahmdhu:172: yac ca khalu punar vajrapāṇe imāni grahamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni kārtikamāsaśuklapakṣasya
K12grahmdhu:173: saptamīm ārabhyopoṣadhiko bhūtvā yāvac caturdaśīgrahanakṣatrān madhye pūjayitvā dine
K12grahmdhu:180: atha te sarve grahāḥ sādhu bhagavann iti kṛtvā praṇamyāntarhitābhūvann iti /
K12grahmdhu:181: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatīparṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
